head.title: A Laptop in the Backpack of Every Child?

hedline.hl1: A Laptop in the Backpack of Every Child?

abstract.p: Letter by New York City high school student Merry Yuan supports proposal to provide all students with laptop computers (S)

block.p: Re ''School Laptops Paid With Ads Called Feasible'' (news article, Sept. 20):

Laptop computers can be a solution for some failing schools and the teacher shortage in New York City. The Internet provides students with unlimited educational information. Having laptops and Internet access also means that students can always stay in touch with their teachers through e-mail.
Re ''School Laptops Paid With Ads Called Feasible'' (news article, Sept. 20):

Laptop computers can be a solution for some failing schools and the teacher shortage in New York City. The Internet provides students with unlimited educational information. Having laptops and Internet access also means that students can always stay in touch with their teachers through e-mail.

It shouldn't matter if a student comes from a poor neighborhood or a wealthy one; every student should be provided with the same educational tools. The laptop proposal will promote equality within the school system.
The writer is a student at Benjamin N. Cardozo High School.
